content.p: Whether you are a new member of staff, already working here or thinking of applying for a job at the University, you should be able to get all the staff related information you need from this page. Visit the job pages for vacancies and job related information. Working here A-Z Current jobs website If you can't find the information you are looking for here, or if you know of a page regularly used by staff that you think should be included, please email us. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5151 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3666 email: enquiry@nottingham.ac.uk
